articles.title: Google Confirms Gmail Update—How To Keep Your Email Account - Forbes
articles.description: You have been warned — do not lose your account.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Keeps Up Fast Pace With US Pre-Order Sellout - Bloomberg
articles.description: Nintendo Co.’s new Switch 2 console maintained strong momentum toward its summer release by quickly selling out pre-orders among US retailers.

articles.title: Bluesky is back up after a major outage - The Verge
articles.description: Bluesky confirmed that it was dealing with “major” problems. The feeds on the website and app weren’t loading, but they appear to have returned.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Edge prices leak on Samsung's own website - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung announced the launch of a new exclusive channel for TV Plus. The company is expanding its premium FAST entertainment platform with the addition of Letterman TV. The new channel goes live today in the USA and Canada. Letterman TV is a 24/7 channel that…

articles.title: Did an Unexpected Brand Just Become the New King of Affordable 4K TVs? - Gear Patrol
articles.description: The well-known brand just started making its own TVs two years ago. Now, it's bringing some of the best features to its more affordable TV line.

articles.title: Perplexity will come to Moto phones after exec testified Google limited access - Ars Technica
articles.description: After telling the court Google blocked its Moto deal, Perplexity debuts on the new Razrs.
